required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of SHR-1222 on Vascular Inflammatory Factors in Patients With Low Bone Mass
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of SHR-1222 on Vascular Inflammatory Factors in Patients With Low Bone Mass

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

clinical_study.source: Second Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to investigate the effects of SHR-1222 on vascular inflammatory factors in patients with low bone mass.

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study, total 50 patients with low bone mass will be enrolled and divided into 5 dose groups. In the lowest dose group 6 subjects will be recruited, among whom 4 will receive SHR-1222 and the other 2 will receive placebo. In each of the other 4 groups, 11 subjects will be recruited, among whom 9 will be administered with SHR-1222 and the other 2 with placebo.
Levels of nitric oxide (NO), Endothelin-1 (ET-1), plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 (PAI-1) and hypersensitivity C-reactive protein (hs-CRP) will be detected in patients before and after the SHR-1222 injection.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serum nitric oxide (NO) change after the administration of SHR-1222
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day0 before the administration and Day 2, 4, 7, 15, 29, 43, 57 after the administration
primary_outcome.description: NO level will be detected by nitrite/nitrate assay (colorimetric).

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serum Endothelin-1 (ET-1) change after the administration of SHR-1222
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day0 before the administration and Day 2, 4, 7, 15, 29, 43, 57 after the administration
primary_outcome.description: ET-1 level will be detected by ELISA.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serum plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 (PAI-1) change after the administration of SHR-1222
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day0 before the administration and Day 2, 4, 7, 15, 29, 43, 57 after the administration
primary_outcome.description: PAI-1 level will be detected by ELISA.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serum hypersensitivity C-reactive protein (hs-CRP) change after the administration of SHR-1222
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day0 before the administration and Day 2, 4, 7, 15, 29, 43, 57 after the administration
primary_outcome.description: hs-CRP level will be detected by immunoturbidimetry assay.

arm_group.description: A single subcutaneous injection of SHR-1222 dose 1 versus placebo
A single subcutaneous injection of SHR-1222 dose 2 versus placebo
A single subcutaneous injection of SHR-1222 dose 3 versus placebo
A single subcutaneous injection of SHR-1222 dose 4 versus placebo
A single subcutaneous injection of SHR-1222 dose 5 versus placebo

intervention.description: Pharmaceutical form: water injection; Route of administration: subcutaneous
Pharmaceutical form: water injection; Route of administration: subcutaneous
